Structs/DeveloperSettings.html#/s:15COSC.name: receipts
Structs/DeveloperSettings.html#/s:15COSC.abstract: receipts: Takes and stores the requested Receipt entities in a FetchedResults variable of type Receipt. This variable is essentially an array of Receipt objects that the user has scanned.

Structs/DeveloperSettings.html#/s:15COSC.name: settings
Structs/DeveloperSettings.html#/s:15COSC.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/AccentColorSelector.html#/s:15CO.name: colors
Structs/AccentColorSelector.html#/s:15CO.abstract: colors Imports an array of tuples containing various colors that are used to style the UI. This is based on the UserSettings ‘style’ setting, and is an @State to update the UI.

Structs/AccentColorSelector.html#/s:15CO.name: settings
Structs/AccentColorSelector.html#/s:15CO.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/ScanDefaultSelector.html#/s:15CO.name: settings
Structs/ScanDefaultSelector.html#/s:15CO.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.name: settings
Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.name: passState
Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.abstract: passState: is used to control the passcode editing state (cereating, updating, removing)

Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.name: passEditScreen
Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.abstract: passEditScreen: is used to control the fullscreen passcodeEdit view. Editing managed the fullscreen presentation, and expected code controls the edit type to be passed through (cereating, updating, removing)

Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.name: passcodeSuccess
Structs/PasscodeSelector.html#/s:15COSC3.abstract: passcodeSuccess: is used to hold the result of a passcode edit result.

Structs/SettingsView.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: settings
Structs/SettingsView.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.name: selectedTab
Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.abstract: selectedTab Controls the TabView’s active tab it is viewing. Imports the TabSelection EnvironmentObject, allowing for application wide changing of the selected tab.

Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.name: scanSelection
Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.abstract: scanSelection is used to manage the screens active view. This is @Binding as it controls the parent views value, allowing it to change the screen as desired.

Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.name: saveState
Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.abstract: SaveState is used to manage the receipts save states while its being saved and processed. (via ScanTranslation).

Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.name: receipt
Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.abstract: receipt: is a Receipt variable that is passed to the view which holds the information about the receipt this view will represent.

Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.name: invalidAlert
Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.abstract: invalidAlert is used to set whether the scan is valid or not. This links with the parent ScanView which actually displays the error.

Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.name: isConfirming
Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.abstract: isConfirming is a bool used to control the confirmation screens sheet.

Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.name: recognizedContent
Structs/DocumentScannerView.html#/s:15CO.abstract: recognizedContent is an object that holds an array of ReceiptItems, holding the information about the scan performed by the user.

Structs/GalleryScannerView.html#/s:15COS.name: selectedTab
Structs/GalleryScannerView.html#/s:15COS.abstract: selectedTab Controls the TabView’s active tab it is viewing. Imports the TabSelection EnvironmentObject, allowing for application wide changing of the selected tab.

Structs/GalleryScannerView.html#/s:15COS.name: scanSelection

Structs/GalleryScannerView.html#/s:15COS.name: saveState

Structs/ConfirmationView.html#/s:15COSC3.name: saveState

Structs/ScannerSelectView.html#/s:15COSC.name: scanSelection

Structs/ScannerSelectView.html#/s:15COSC.name: settings
Structs/ScannerSelectView.html#/s:15COSC.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: settings
Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: settings Alters the view based on the user’s settings. Imports the UserSettings EnvironmentObject allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: inSimulator
Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: inSimulator provides a bool based on if the application is in a simulator. Allows the view to avoid errors relating to the camera being available or not.

Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: scanSelection
Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: scanSelection is used to manage the screens active view, based on the values presented in the ScanView’s documentation.

Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: saveState
Structs/ScanView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: SaveState is used to manage the receipts save states while its being saved and processed. (via ScanTranslation).

Structs/ScanTranslation.html#/s:15COSC34.name: scannedImages
Structs/ScanTranslation.html#/s:15COSC34.abstract: scannedImages is an array of UI Images that contains the images of the receipts the user has scanned.

Structs/ScanTranslation.html#/s:15COSC34.name: recognizedContent
Structs/ScanTranslation.html#/s:15COSC34.abstract: recognizedContent is an object that holds arrays of ReceiptItems, which contain the text and image of a processed receipt.

Structs/ScanTranslation.html#/s:15COSC34.name: didFinishRecognition
Structs/ScanTranslation.html#/s:15COSC34.abstract: didFinishRecognition is a variable that allows the struct to return whether the recognition has finished.

Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.name: presentationMode
Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.abstract: presentationMode: Controls the presentation of the sheet the receipt is being displayed on. Specifically used in the dismiss button

Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.name: detailState
Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.abstract: detailState: binds to the parent views detailState, to update it based on the users interaction.

Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.name: receipt
Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.abstract: receipt: is a Receipt variable that is passed to the view which allows this view to delete and update it as needed.

Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.name: settings
Structs/ReceiptViewButtons.html#/s:15COS.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/ReceiptDetailView.html#/s:15COSC.name: receipt
Structs/ReceiptDetailView.html#/s:15COSC.abstract: receipt: is a Receipt variable that is passed to the view which holds the information about the receipt this view will represent.

Structs/ReceiptDetailView.html#/s:15COSC.name: detailState
Structs/ReceiptDetailView.html#/s:15COSC.abstract: detailState: allows the view to update based on how the user desired to interact with the receipt. Allows the user to delete, view the image, and view the receipt.

Structs/ReceiptDetailView.html#/s:15COSC.name: settings
Structs/ReceiptDetailView.html#/s:15COSC.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: receipt
Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: receipt: is a Receipt variable that is passed to the view which holds the information about the receipt this view will represent.

Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: selected
Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: selected: is a Bool that controls the visibility of the ReceiptDetailView sheet, when true the sheet is visible, when false the sheet is not visible.

Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: pendingDelete
Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: pendingDelete: is a Bool that shows the delete button for a user to confirm a deletion of a receipt.

Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: settings
Structs/ReceiptView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/Prediction.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.name: categoryKeywords
Structs/Prediction.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.abstract: categoryKeywords is an array of tuples that are used as the basis for the folder prediction process.

Structs/PersistenceController.html#/s:15.name: shared
Structs/PersistenceController.html#/s:15.abstract: shared allows the PersistanceController to be accessed as an object outside of this struct.

Structs/PersistenceController.html#/s:15.name: preview
Structs/PersistenceController.html#/s:15.abstract: preview initializes Xcode’s canvas database with the specified values.

Structs/PersistenceController.html#/s:15.name: container
Structs/PersistenceController.html#/s:15.abstract: container is a NSPersistentContainer that holds the apps database.

Structs/PasscodeButton.html#/s:15COSC345.name: settings
Structs/PasscodeButton.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: settings Alters the view based on the user’s settings. Imports the UserSettings EnvironmentObject allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/PasscodeButton.html#/s:15COSC345.name: number
Structs/PasscodeButton.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: number is the number that you want the button to implement.

Structs/PasscodeButton.html#/s:15COSC345.name: passcodeIn
Structs/PasscodeButton.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: passcodeIn is a binding string that holds the current input passcode.

Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: presentationMode
Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: presentationMode: is used to control the presentation of a sheet modal view.

Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: settings
Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: settings: Alters the view based on the user’s settings. Imports the UserSettings EnvironmentObject allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: backgroundColor
Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: backgroundColor: controls the background color. Used to update the background based on a success or failure.

Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: result
Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: result: holds the final result of the edit, this includes whether the view exits with success (bool) and the final code.

Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: editType
Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: editType: is used for setting the edit type. “creating” for creating a new pass, “updating” for updating a pass, current passcode for deleting.

Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: repeatPass
Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: repeatPass: is used for comparison when confirming a passcode.

Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: confirmedPass
Structs/PasscodeEdit.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: confirmedPass: is used to control the view’s features when confirming a passcode.

Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.name: presentationMode
Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: presentationMode: is used to control the presentation of a sheet modal view.

Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.name: receipts
Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: receipts: Takes and stores the requested Receipt entities in a FetchedResults variable of type Receipt. This variable is essentially an array of Receipt objects that the user has scanned.

Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.name: settings
Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: settings Alters the view based on the user’s settings. Imports the UserSettings EnvironmentObject allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.name: locked
Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: locked: controls whether the screen is locked and present.

Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.name: backgroundColor
Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: backgroundColor: controls the background color. Used to update the background based on a success or failure.

Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.name: resetting
Structs/PasscodeScreen.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: resetting: controls whether the passcode reset screen is present.

Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: settings
Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: selectedFolder
Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: selectedFolder: Filters the search results based on the users selected Folder, so that only receipts within the selected Folder are displayed.

Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: userSearch
Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: userSearch: Filters the search results based on the users search input into the titlebar/search bar. This applies to every section of a receipt.

Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: colors
Structs/HomeTitleBar.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: colors: Imports an array of tuples containing various colors that are used to style the UI. This is based on the UserSettings ‘style’ setting, and is an @State to update the UI.

Structs/NoReceiptsView.html#/s:15COSC345.name: selectedTab
Structs/NoReceiptsView.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: selectedTab Controls the TabView’s active tab it is viewing. In this case, it is used to switch the user’s view to the scanning page.

Structs/NoReceiptsView.html#/s:15COSC345.name: settings
Structs/NoReceiptsView.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: receipts: Takes and stores the requested Receipt entities in a FetchedResults variable of type Receipt. This variable is essentially an array of Receipt objects that the user has scanned.

Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: folders
Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: folders: Takes and stores the requested Folder entities in a FetchedResults variable of type Folder. This variable is essentially an array of Folder objects relating to the receipts predicted folders.

Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: userSearch
Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: userSearch: Filters the search results based on the users search input into the titlebar/search bar. This applies to every section of a receipt.

Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: selectedFolder
Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: selectedFolder: Filters the search results based on the users selected Folder, so that only receipts within the selected Folder are displayed.

Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: colors
Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: colors: Imports an array of tuples containing various colors that are used to style the UI. This is based on the UserSettings ‘style’ setting, and is an @State to update the UI.

Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.name: settings
Structs/HomeView.html#/s:15COSC345_Proje.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/FolderView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.name: folder
Structs/FolderView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.abstract: folder: is a Folder variable that is passed to the view which holds the information about the folder this view will represent.

Structs/FolderView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.name: selectedFolder
Structs/FolderView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.abstract: selectedFolder: is a String that holds the text of the folders title, used in filtering receipt results in HomeView.

Structs/FolderView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.name: settings
Structs/FolderView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pro.abstract: settings: Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: settings
Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: settings Imports the UserSettings environment object allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: colors
Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: colors Imports an array of tuples containing various colors that are used to style the UI. This is based on the UserSettings ‘style’ setting, and is an @State to update the UI.

Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: title
Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: title is a String that is used to set the titles text.

Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: icon
Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: icon is a String that is used to set the titles icon.

Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: body
Structs/TitleText.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: The title that is seen in all tabs.

Structs/BackgroundView.html#/s:15COSC345.name: body
Structs/BackgroundView.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: A simple color, which allows for the background of the app to be changed app wide.

Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: selectedTab
Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: selectedTab Controls the TabView’s active tab it is viewing. Imports the TabSelection EnvironmentObject, allowing for application wide changing of the selected tab.

Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: settings
Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: settings Alters the view based on the user’s settings. Imports the UserSettings EnvironmentObject allowing unified usage and updating of the users settings across all classes.

Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: colors
Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: colors Imports an array of tuples containing various colors that are used to style the UI. This is based on the UserSettings ‘style’ setting, and is an @State to update the UI.

Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: locked
Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: locked locks the screen if the user has passcode protection enabled

Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: body
Structs/ContentView.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: The View consists of a tabview that holds our three tabs. A fullscreen cover holds the passcode screen, enabled when settings permit.

Structs/COSC345_ProjectApp.html#/s:15COS.name: persistenceController
Structs/COSC345_ProjectApp.html#/s:15COS.abstract: persistenceController is used to control the CoreData databases context, which is passed as an environment object to be used in the application.

Functions.html#/s:15COSC345_Project14hap.name: hapticFeedback(type:)
Functions.html#/s:15COSC345_Project14hap.abstract: is used to trigger a haptic feedback vibration

Extensions/Image.html#/s:7SwiftUI5ImageV.name: init(data:)
Extensions/Image.html#/s:7SwiftUI5ImageV.abstract: Overrides the Image(data: Data) parameter to allow for optional values without a default value. This is a quality of life function, serving to make code look prettier.

Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.name: screenWidth
Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.abstract: Returns the UIScreens size of width in the form of a CGFloat

Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.name: screenHeight
Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.abstract: Returns the UIScreens size of height in the form of a CGFloat

Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.name: screenSize
Extensions/UIScreen.html#/s:So8UIScreenC.abstract: Returns the UIScreens size of width and height in the form of a CGFloat

Enums/TabPage.html#/s:15COSC345_Project7.name: home
Enums/TabPage.html#/s:15COSC345_Project7.abstract: home: When this is active it will change the TabView to index 0, resulting in HomeView being active.

Enums/TabPage.html#/s:15COSC345_Project7.name: scan
Enums/TabPage.html#/s:15COSC345_Project7.abstract: home: When this is active it will change the TabView to index 1, resulting in ScanView being active.

Enums/TabPage.html#/s:15COSC345_Project7.name: settings
Enums/TabPage.html#/s:15COSC345_Project7.abstract: home: When this is active it will change the TabView to index 2, resulting in SettingsView being active.

Enums/SaveState.html#/s:15COSC345_Projec.name: none
Enums/SaveState.html#/s:15COSC345_Projec.abstract: none: When none is active, the receipt doesn’t need saving. This is its default state.

Enums/SaveState.html#/s:15COSC345_Projec.name: recognizing
Enums/SaveState.html#/s:15COSC345_Projec.abstract: recognizing: When confirming is active, the receipt is being confirmed by the user.

Enums/ScanSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: none
Enums/ScanSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: none: When none is active, the ScannerSelectView is active. Showing the user the option to pick between camera or gallery to scan.

Enums/ScanSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: camera
Enums/ScanSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: camera: When camera is active, the DocumentScannerView is active. Showing the user the document scanner to scan with.

Enums/ScanSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: gallery
Enums/ScanSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: gallery: When camera is active, the GalleryScannerView is active. Showing the user the gallery to scan with.

Enums/DetailState.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: none
Enums/DetailState.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: none: When this is active it will present the view in its default view, with nothing active.

Enums/DetailState.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: text
Enums/DetailState.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: text: When this is active it will present the text of the receipt.

Enums/DetailState.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.name: deleting
Enums/DetailState.html#/s:15COSC345_Proj.abstract: deleting: When this is active it will present the user with a delete confirmation button, allowing them to delete a receipt.

Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.name: none
Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: none: When this is active it will present the view in its default view, with nothing active.

Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.name: updating
Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: updating: When this is active the user is updating their passcode, requiring entry of the current passcode before confirming a new one.

Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.name: creating
Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: creating: When this is active the user will be asked to enter and confirm a new passcode.

Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.name: removing
Enums/PassEditingState.html#/s:15COSC345.abstract: removing: When this is active the user is removing passcode protection, requiring entry of the current passcode before passcode protection is removed.

Classes/TabSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: selection
Classes/TabSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: selection: Used to set the active tab of the ContentView’s TabView. Controlled either by directly setting, or through the changeTab function.

Classes/TabSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: changeTab(tabPage:)
Classes/TabSelection.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: Used to change the active tab using a TabPage value. This allows for easy tab changing, meaning we don’t need to remember the raw values of each page.

Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: darkMode
Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: darkMode is a Boolean that controls the applications UI dark mode setting. True results in dark mode, whereas False results in light mode.

Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: accentColor
Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: accentColor is an Int that controls the index of the color style array used in the accent colors of the applicaiton.

Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: devMode
Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: devMode is a Boolean that controls whether the Settings show the developer options. True for dev mode, false for regular mode.

Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: scanDefault
Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: scanDefault is a ScanDefault that picks a default for the users scan method. 0 will give the user the option, 1 defaults to document scanner, and 2 default to image picker.

Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: passcodeProtection
Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: passcodeProtection is a Boolean that enabled passcode protection, requiring a passcode for access.

Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: passcode
Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: passcode holds the users passcode used for passcode protection.

Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.name: init()
Classes/UserSettings.html#/s:15COSC345_P.abstract: Initializes the variables to their default variables if not already set.

Classes/ReceiptItem.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: uuid
Classes/ReceiptItem.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: uuid holds a unique ID that allows the object to be identifiable

Classes/ReceiptItem.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: text
Classes/ReceiptItem.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: text is the text extracted from the image of the receipt the user has scanned.

Classes/ReceiptItem.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.name: image
Classes/ReceiptItem.html#/s:15COSC345_Pr.abstract: image is a UI Image that the user has scanned of their receipt, and which the receipt is based on.

Classes/RecognizedContent.html#/s:15COSC.name: items
Classes/RecognizedContent.html#/s:15COSC.abstract: items holds the array of ReceiptItem variables.

Classes/Folder.html#/s:15COSC345_Project.name: folders
Classes/Folder.html#/s:15COSC345_Project.abstract: All functions in here can be called by the code Folder.functionName().
